metadata.title: AWS for the Haters in 100 Seconds
metadata.creator: Fireship

tracks.text: Line chart of dependence and cost, where the line looks like the AWS logo
POV you tried to scale your own servers with 99.9999% uptime

Me: I just need to host 'Hello World' on the cloud. AWS: No problem. Have you checked all of our cool named products you'll never understand. AWS gestures to a diagram with 15 nodes, 8 regions, and 19 interconnected links.
The house on fire meme. Instead of saying 'This is fine', it's an status picture with a green check saying 'No recent events.'
We hear feasting upon open source. Meme of AWS eating FOSS.
